thread.title: US Partners resell Office 365 faster with SherWeb's new 2-Tier CSP
thread.title_full: US Partners resell Office 365 faster with SherWeb's new 2-Tier CSP

author: Maude Tanguay
title: US Partners resell Office 365 faster with SherWeb's new 2-Tier CSP
text:
Cloud services provider SherWeb has joined an elite group of Microsoft partners that can now distribute Office 365 to resellers in the United States. Today’s announcement has positioned SherWeb as a market leader in North America for Office 365 under Microsoft’s Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) program.
SherWeb started distributing Office 365 to its partners under the CSP program in Canada last year. It currently sells thousands of subscriptions every month through its channel partners. Jason Brown, Director of Product Management for SherWeb, said part of the company’s success with Office 365 can be attributed to its all-inclusive technical support and migration services.
"SherWeb is a new kind of distributor in the cloud services market," said Brown. "What differentiates us from the others is our free 24/7 support and migration. The fact that we can offer multiple cloud services to clients in a single move is key to a partner’s success in the cloud."
Resellers get to market in 10 minutes
Office 365 is one of the fastest growing products in the IT sector. SherWeb’s all-inclusive migration and support services will now enable US partners to resell Office 365 on their own terms within minutes. This means very little upfront investment.
SherWeb has become a major player in reselling cloud services to partners in the US, mainly through its Hosted Exchange and Infrastructure-as-a-Service solutions. Becoming a distributor in the US will allow SherWeb’s 4,000 partners to take advantage of the company’s expertise and one-stop shop experience.
Microsoft’s CSP program allows partners to sell Microsoft cloud solutions with their own offerings and services. Partners own the complete customer lifecycle through direct billing, provisioning, management and support.
About SherWeb Inc. – Since 1998, SherWeb has been helping businesses increase agility and trim IT overhead with our best-in-class cloud services. Today, more than 25,000 customers in over 100 countries are working more productively thanks to the added value we build into our one-stop-shop of SaaS, IaaS and PaaS solutions. SherWeb also has a growing network of 4,000 partners who successfully resell our affordable and customizable cloud services around the world. For details, visit http://www.sherweb.com .
